UPDATE: I've just spoken to Argos (the ebay Argos) who looked up the EAN number. The gentleman I spoke to seems to think it's actually the 2gb version, but if it's not I can have a free return because of the ambiguity in the listing.

UPDATE 2: it's looking even better for 2gb RAM because I think the 1gb has a different model number - Z370C-1A007A.  The model number for the 2gb model seems to be: z370c-1a054a which is in the Argos listing.  Having said, even though it's likely to be the 2gb version, I can't actually "guarantee" that you'll receive the 2gb model.

My lad dropped and smashed his Hudl 2 so I've been looking for a cheap replacement.  This seems to be an absolute bargain to me. A valuable tool, this angle grinder from Challenge will cut through metal or masonry with no problem. With its quick release blade guard, spindle lock and three handle positions, it's a DIY must-have.

Protective guard.
